title: Ridiculous lag spikes while not lagging on anything else
body: I've been getting lag spikes often which have me reconnecting at 1000+ ping from my normal ping of around 50. It's really weird as I've been with my ISP for the past half decade, and nothing had changed on my computer except the patch. I loaded up my logs and it didn't even show that my ping had leaped that high even though I kept attempting to reconnect for a good portion of the game. Is this happening to others as well or is it just me?

replies.body:
I haven't been seeing too many reports of server issues, but this doesn't mean that you're having internet problems either. Sometimes your network can have a hard time communicating with certain servers, ours in this case. 

There are a few different things that can cause those lag spikes such as out of date drivers or certain network settings. Let's be sure to hit all our bases with this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and let me know if that doesn't seem to help!

It is happening to me too. It's "fine" some games with just 1-2 mins of spiking ping (400ms). Last game I was disconnecting and reconnecting over and over, and experienced ping from 50-900ms within 40 seconds. As fast as the game was finished everything was as usual.
